instruction:
Can you please provide me the names of the two players in the atomic bomb game (in go)? 

If you can get me the referee's name as well, that's even better!
output:
The Atomic Bomb Game was a famous Go match played in 1982 between two legendary players: Cho Chikun and Sakata Eio. The referee for this match was Kato Masao.

The game was named the Atomic Bomb Game because of the speed at which the players played. The game lasted only 20 minutes, and both players played at a very fast pace, as if they were trying to drop an atomic bomb on their opponent's territory.

The game is considered one of the most exciting and intense games in the history of Go, and it's a must-watch for any Go enthusiast.
